## MatchLength interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MatchLength 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [full](./extension-mention.matchlength.full.md) | <code>string</code> | The complete match independent of the cursor position. |
|  [partial](./extension-mention.matchlength.partial.md) | <code>string</code> | This value is a partial match which ends at the position of the cursor within the matching text. |
